import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get verifications for asset"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/verifications"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all verification records for a specific asset. Use this to view the audit history of a single device.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id) to obtain.

**Workflow Example**
1. Load asset: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id) to confirm identity.
2. Fetch verifications: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/verifications](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-verifications-for-asset).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets), extract `Items[].AssetId` from response.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchAssets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets","responseField":"Items[].AssetId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Verifications retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Paginated list of asset verification records.","properties":{"ItemCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of verifications returned."},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of verification records.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Full asset verification record including location and audit policy details.","properties":{"AssetVerificationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the verification record."},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset that was verified."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the verification was created.","nullable":true},"VerifiedByUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User that completed the verification.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"AssetVerificationTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Verification mode identifier such as `web-manual`.","example":"web-manual"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the verification passed."},"Comments":{"type":"string","description":"Optional notes captured during verification.","nullable":true},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS latitude captured during mobile verification.","nullable":true},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS longitude captured during mobile verification.","nullable":true},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the location. Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2), extract `Items[].LocationId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMyLocationsV2","endpoint":"GET /api/v2.0/locations","responseField":"Items[].LocationId"}},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional room within the location.","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"External identifier supplied by integrated systems.","nullable":true},"AssetAuditPolicyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Audit policy associated with this verification.","nullable":true},"ActualQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Actual quantity observed during inventory verification.","nullable":true},"ExpectedQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Expected quantity per inventory records.","nullable":true}},"title":"AssetVerification"}},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Pagination metadata for list responses.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Current page index (zero-based)."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of items per page."},"TotalCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of items available."},"TotalPages":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available."}},"title":"PagingResponse"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code."},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp of the request."}},"title":"AssetVerificationListResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Asset not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
